EXTRACTED VALUE: Thunder beat writer Darnell Mayberry reports that Jeff Green (ankle) will be in the starting lineup for Sunday's game against the Rockets.
The Bulls have reportedly made forward James Johnson available in ongoing trade talks with the Trail Blazers for Rudy Fernandez.
DeMar DeRozan scored 21 points on 7-of-12 shooting with six rebounds, three assists, and a steal in 42 minutes against the Heat on Saturday.
Tyreke Evans scored 25 points on 11-of-20 shooting (including three 3-pointers) with five rebounds, eight assists, and a steal on Saturday.
Shaun Livingston (knee) went through a full practice Tuesday and will play in the season opener.
Chauncey Billups has been activated for Sunday's game against Phoenix after missing his last couple with a wrist injury.
Jarrett Jack, David Andersen and Marcus Banks are expected to join the Hornets in L.A. on Monday for a game against the Clippers.
Pistons president of basketball operations Joe Dumars says he has nothing even remotely close to a trade on the table involving Richard Hamilton.
Yi Jianlian (knee) will be available to play for the Wizards vs. Portland on Friday.
Jared Jeffries double-doubled with 12 points and 10 rebounds off the bench on Tuesday, adding four blocks in 28 minutes against the Grizzlies.
